lead_paragraph: Kobe Bryant, the NBA's highest-paid player based on his 2016 salary, has reportedly turned down a pitch from European club FC Barcelona to extend his basketball career overseas.

headline.print_headline: Bryant Reportedly Turned Down Barcelona Bid
headline.main: Bryant Reportedly Turned Down Barcelona Bid

snippet: Kobe Bryant, the NBA's highest-paid player based on his 2016 salary, has reportedly turned down a pitch from European club FC Barcelona to extend his basketball career overseas....
